alphabet.description: The list of characters used for the input language

base_rate.description: Base learning rate, modified according to batch size to prevent exploding gradients

batch_size.description: The number of documents to batch together in one training step

dataset.description: The dataset the model is being trained on

doc_length.description: A fixed width of which all documents are cast to either by padding or trucation

epochs.description: The number of training steps between checkpoints

eras.description: The number of checkpoints to make during training

mode.description: Whether to train a model or evaluate a current one

randomize.description: How much to randomize the starting weights

model_path.description: The path to a model to load
